maximize_recall.name: Maximize Recall (Safety First)
maximize_recall.description: Catches the most complications. Best for patient safety.

maximize_accuracy.name: Maximize Accuracy
maximize_accuracy.description: Highest overall correctness. Fewer false alarms.

maximize_combined.name: Maximize Combined (Recall + Accuracy)
maximize_combined.description: Balances catching complications and overall correctness.

maximize_f1.name: Maximize F1 (Balance)
maximize_f1.description: Balances recall and precision using F1 score.

youden.name: Youden's J (Optimal ROC)
youden.description: Optimal point on ROC curve (sensitivity + specificity).
